author: fwyzard
body:
* CUDA 9.2.88
    Add support for Clang 5.0 and GCC 7.x
    Add support for the PTX ISA version 6.2
    Add support for the NVTX v3 interface
    Update cuBLAS, NPP, cuFFT, cuSOLVER, cuSPARSE, and Thrust .

  * Patch 1 (Released May 16, 2018)
    cuBLAS 9.2 Patch Update: This update includes fix to cublas GEMM APIs on V100 Tensor Core GPUs when used with default algorithm CUBLAS_GEMM_DEFAULT_TENSOR_OP.

See https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/9.2/Prod/docs/sidebar/CUDA_Toolkit_Release_Notes.pdf .
title: Update CUDA to version 9.2.88 with Patch 1 to cuBLAS
